Domain

Represents a domain as used by the RDT algorithm.

Functions
Constructor
constructor(
ground,
semanticDesc,
salience,
partition
)
Params
ground

set of object in this Domain

semanticDesc

set of property-value pairs applying to all objects in the ground

salience

int, score describing how 'activated' a Domain is in the current dialogue

partition

triple: property name, object mapping property values to sets of objects with this value, focus of partition
